about.creation1:
The poster gallery 'Global Change Poster Explorer' was initiated as part of the Master module 'Hot Spots of Global Change' in Physical Geography in the winter term in 2019/2020.
Prof. Dr. RÃ¼diger Glaser developed the concept and supervised the content of the posters, and Michael Kahle was responsible for programming and publication on FreiDok.
about.creation2:
This format has since been adopted for the Global Change Lecture Series. Several lecturers of geography in Freiburg are involved in this lecture series.
The topics, approaches and locations are correspondingly diverse.
Posters can be filtered by theme, location, concept, and various landscape types or located on the overview map.
